content: crocheted lip balm holder if you love lip balm like i do my current obsession is burt s bees with peppermint oil yay you keep it everywhere in your purse on your desk in both bathrooms next to your bed a few more in your purse you never want to be without some instant moisture for your lips the only place i can t keep it is in the car as i live in the south and already it s so hot that lip balm will melt in my pocket on the way to the car let alone in the console so something i could attach to my keychain is just what the dermatologist ordered also great for attaching to a back pack gym bag water bottle holder just about anywhere you need a little lip-aid you could even lengthen the tube and use it for those purse-sized hand sanitizers http //www germattack net/ as always i encourage you to experiment use beads or other embellishments use a crazy yarn make it bigger or smaller to fit what you need make it in camo colors for your little boy make ten and have glove-less fingers instead of fingerless gloves d i m thinking of using this for finger puppets too materials see the following link for the yarn i used i love their yarns http //www peaches-creme com/ 4-ply worsted weight cotton yarn in your choice of colors the plain holder looks great in ombres for the examples pictured i used 95 red for the plain holder and 51 apple green color a and 165 daisy ombre color b for the flower design boye crochet hook usg 6/4 00mm scissors a keyring lanyard clip or other findings for attaching your holder to your keys abbreviations chain-chain slip_stitch-slip_stitch double_crochet-double_crochet single_crochet-single_crochet base row chain 4 join with slip_stitch in the first chain to form a ring for the flowered version this is done in color a 2nd row single_crochet nine times into the ring join last st to the first with slip_stitch i usually pull the tail of thread through the center at this point and trim so it lays on the inside 3rd row single_crochet in the back loop of each st at this point you will not join the last to the first st but just keep spiraling around be sure to crochet into the back loop if you want it to look like mine this places the ridges on the inside and provides grip otherwise have fun with it crochet until the length of the tube is about 2 and 3/4 inches long or it fits the tube you are trying to carry now you can decide which version you want plain or the flowered plain all that s left is to finish when the tube has reached the desired length chain 5 single_crochet into the next st in the body then slip_stitch in the next st and fasten_off weave in the ends and attach the key ring or
